product_name: Pacsafe Strapsafe 100 TSA Accepted Luggage Strap
long_description: The Pacsafe Strapsafe(TM) 100 TSA Accepted luggage strap ensures sticky fingers can't loosen your bag once you've locked it. TSA agents can check your luggage and relock it without damaging it. Integrated 3-dial combination lock can be opened by TSA (US) & HSRC (UK) luggage inspectors. Indicator light tells you when lock has been opened by TSA or HRSC agent. 2 in. wide polypropylene webbing; maximum length 74.8 in. is long enough to wrap completely around a large piece of luggage. Baggage Constrictor(TM) technology means the Pacsafe Strapsafe 100 TSA Accepted luggage strap can't be loosened when locked.
short_description: The Pacsafe Strapsafe(TM) 100 TSA Accepted luggage strap ensures sticky fingers can't loosen your bag once you've locked it. TSA agents can check your luggage and relock it without damaging it.
